mapping.name: ${province_en}_VERIFICATIONFILL_EXPLAIN_${yesterday}.csv
mapping.templet: 电信数据核查模板-文件类型_四期-explain.ftl
mapping.sql:
SELECT T.PRO_NAME AS "省份", T.VER_NO AS "核查单号", T.RECEIPT_PERSON AS "回执人", TO_CHAR(T.RECEIPT_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS "回执时间" FROM MOD_VERIFICATIONFILL_ACK T
where trunc(T.RECEIPT_DATE,'hh') =to_date('%%Y-%%M-%%D %%H','yyyy-mm-dd hh24') and (nbi_ststus=1 )

SELECT T.PRO_NAME AS "省份", T.VER_NO AS "核查单号", T.EXPLAIN_PERSON AS "解释人", TO_CHAR(T.EXPLAIN_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS "解释原因时间", T.EXPLAIN_DECSCRIPTION AS "解释原因" FROM MOD_VERIFICATIONFILL_EXPLAIN T
where trunc(T.EXPLAIN_DATE,'hh') =to_date('%%Y-%%M-%%D %%H','yyyy-mm-dd hh24') and (nbi_ststus=0 or nbi_ststus is null)
and exists ( SELECT 1 FROM MOD_VERIFICATIONFILL_ACK m
where trunc(m.RECEIPT_DATE,'hh') =to_date('%%Y-%%M-%%D %%H','yyyy-mm-dd hh24') and m.nbi_ststus=1 and t.ver_no = m.ver_no
)

trigger.property: update MOD_VERIFICATIONFILL_EXPLAIN t set nbi_ststus=1 where trunc(T.EXPLAIN_DATE,'hh') =to_date('%%Y-%%M-%%D %%H','yyyy-mm-dd hh24') and (nbi_ststus=0 or nbi_ststus is null)
